Verses: 1 aa, En Thalai Thanneerum, En Kangal Kanneerootrumaanaal Nalamaayirukkum; Appozhudhu En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththi Kolaiyunnak Koduththavargal Nimiththam Naan Iravumpagalum Azhuven.

2 aa, Vanaandharaththil Vazhippokkarin Thaabaram Enakku Irundhaal Nalamaayirukkum; Appozhudhu Naan En Janaththaivittu, Avargalidaththil Iraadhapadikkup Poividuven; Avargalellaarum Vibasaararum Dhrogigalin Koottamumaayirukkiraargal.

3 avargal Poiyaip Prayogikkath Thangal Naavaagiya Villai Valaikkiraargal; Avargal Indha Dhesaththile Balaththukkolvadhu Saththiyaththukkaaga Alla; Pollaappilirundhu Pollaappukku Nadandherugiraargal; Ennaiyo Ariyaadhirukkiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 neengal Avanavan Than Than Snegidhanukku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Endha Sagodharanaiyum Nambaadhirungal; Endha Sagodharanum Mosampannugiraan, Endha Snegidhanum Thootriththirigiraan.
5 avargal Meyyaip Pesaamal Ovvoruvarum Thamakkaduththavanai Eykkiraargal; Poiyaippesath Thangal Naavaip Pazhakkugiraargal, Akkiramancheyya Uzhaikkiraargal.
6 kabadaththin Naduvile Kudiyirukkiraai; Kabadaththinimiththam Avargal Ennai Ariyamaattomengiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naan Avargalai Urukki, Avargalaip Pudamiduven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyai Verendhappragaaramaaga Nadaththuven?

8 avargal Naavu Koormaiyaakkappatta Ambu, Adhu Kabadam Pesugiradhu; Avanavan Than Than Ayalaanode Than Than Vaayinaale Samaadhaanamaaip Pesugiraan, Aanaalum Than Ullaththile Avanukkuppadhividai Vaikkiraan.
9 ivaigalinimiththam Avargalai Visaariyaadhiruppeno? Ippadippatta Jaadhikku En Aaththumaa Needhiyai Sarikkattaadhirukkumo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 malaigalukkaaga Azhudhu Dhukkankondaaduven; Vanaandharath Thaabarangalukkaagap Pulambuven; Oruvanum Avaigalaik Kadandhupogaadhavannamaaga Avaigal Paazhaakkappattuk Kidakkindrana; Aadumaadugalin Saththam Ketkappadugiradhumillai; Aagaasaththup Paravaigalum Mirugajeevangalum Ellaam Odi Sidharippoyina.
11 naan Erusalemai Manmedugalum Valusarppangalin Thaabaramumaakkuven; Yoodhaavin Pattanangalaiyum Kudiyillaadhapadi Paazhaakkippoduven.

12 idhai Unaraththakka Gnaanamullavan Yaar? Dhesam Azhindhu, Oruvanum Kadandhupogaadhapadi Adhu Paazhaakkappadugira Mugaandharamennavendru Karththarudaiya Vaai Thannudane Sollugiradhaikkettu Arivikkaththakkavan Yaar?
13 naan Avaravarukku Vidhiththa En Nyaayappramaanaththai Avargal Vittu, En Sollaik Kelaamalum, Adhinpadi Nadavaamalum,
14 thangaludaiya Irudhayaththin Kadinaththaiyum, Thangal Pidhaakkal Thangalukkuk Katrukkoduththapadi Paagaalgalaiyum Pinthodarndhaargale Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
15 aadhalaal, Idho, Naan Indha Janaththukkup Pusikka Ettiyaiyum, Kudikkap Pichchukkalandha Thanneeraiyum Koduththu,

16 avargalum, Avargal Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadha Purajaadhigalukkulle Avargalai Sidharadiththu, Pattayam Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkumattum Adhai Avargalukkuppinnaaga Anuppuven Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
17 neengal Yosanaipanni, Pulambarkaarigalai Varavazhaiththu, Adhile Pazhagina Sthreegalaik Kooppidungalendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
18 avargal Seekkiramaai Vandhu, Nammudaiya Kangal Kanneeraai Soriyaththakkadhaagavum, Nammudaiya Imaigal Thanneeraai Odaththakkadhaagavum, Oppaarisollakkadavargal.

19 eththanaiyaaip Paazhaakkappattom! Migavum Kalangiyirukkirom; Naangal Dhesaththai Vittuppogirom, Engal Vaasasthalangalai Avargal Kavizhththuppottaargal Endru Seeyonilirundhu Undaagira Pulambalin Saththam Ketkappadum.

20 aadhalaal Sthreegale, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Ungal Sevi Avarudaiya Vaayin Vasanaththai Etrukkollattum; Neengal Ungal Kumaaraththigalukku Oppaariyaiyum, Avalaval Thanthan Thozhikkup Pulambalaiyum Katrukkodungal.
21 veedhiyilirukkira Kuzhandhaigalaiyum, Therukkalilirukkira Ilaignaraiyum Sangaarampanna Saavu Nammudaiya Palaganigalileri, Nammudaiya Aramanaigalil Pravesiththadhu.
22 manusharin Savangal Vayalveliyinmel Eruvaippolavum, Arukkiravanukkup Pinnaale Oruvanum Vaarikkollaadhirukkira Ariyaippolavum Kidakkum Endru Karththar Uraiththaar Endru Sol.

23 gnaani Than Gnaanaththaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattavendaam; Paraakkiraman Than Paraakkiramaththaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattavendaam; Aisuvariyavaan Than Aisuvariyaththaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattavendaam;

24 menmaipaaraattugiravan Boomiyile Kirubaiyaiyum Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seygira Karththar Naan Endru Ennai Arindhu Unarndhirukkiradhaikkuriththe Menmaipaaraattakkadavan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Ivaigalinmel Piriyamaayirukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
25 idho, Naatkal Varum; Appozhudhu Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalodunkooda Viruththasedhanamulla Yaavaraiyum,

26 egipthaiyum, Yoodhaavaiyum, Edhomaiyum, Ammon Puththiraraiyum, Movaabaiyum, Kadaisi Ellaigalilulla Vanaandharakkudigalaana Yaavaraiyum Dhandippen; Purajaadhiyaar Anaivarum Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargal; Aanaalum Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarum Irudhayaththile Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
